sections.heading: Charter; grant; when.The Department of Banking and Finance may grant a charter to transact the business of a credit card bank if the Director of Banking and Finance is satisfied that the applicant has met the conditions set forth in section 8-2401 and the Nebraska Banking Act as to the formation of
sections.text: Charter; grant; when.The Department of Banking and Finance may grant a charter to transact the business of a credit card bank if the Director of Banking and Finance is satisfied that the applicant has met the conditions set forth in section 8-2401 and the Nebraska Banking Act as to the formation of a new bank.SourceLaws 2004, LB 999, ยง 18.Cross ReferencesNebraska Banking Act, see section 8-101.02.
